name: Rolling Bhakundo Android Version
description:
This is the android version of Rolling Bhakundo.  In this game we have to control the ball.  We go through various level.  We have to fo through various obstacles in each level. The difficulty of game increases in each level.  You will get enjoyable experience while playing this game. The simulation of ball may give you new experience of game. 

You can controll the ball using buttons.
